description: Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the streams and categories listed above.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
**Tender Notice**
.roll scroll
**Contracting Authority:** Department of National Defense

**Solicitation Number:** S4795356

**Notice Solicitation Date:** January 23, 2024

**Proposal Submissions Closing Date:** January 29, 2024 13:00:00

**Trade Agreements:** This solicitation is open to suppliers that are eligible under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

**Notice of Invitation to Tender:**
The Department of National Defense has a requirement for Temporary Help Services, under the Supply Arrangement (EN578-172870), and invites Pre-Qualified Suppliers to submit a proposal in response to this solicitation.

**Notice Details:**

*   *Notice Reference Number*: CB-146-61535531
*   *Notice Title (English and French)*: Temporary Help Services – One (1) Special Advisor. Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR) / Besoin en services d’aide temporaire – Un (1) Conseiller spécial. Services d’aide temporaire dans le cadre de l’arrangement en matière d’approvisionnement pour la région de la capitale nationale.
*   *File Number*: S4795356-001

**Notice Classification:** Expired

**Location of Work:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**UNSPSC Code:** 80111600 (Temporary personnel services / Services de personnels temporaires)

**FPSC Code:** 013-13.9 (Policy and advisory services / Politique et services consultatifs)

**Notice Description:** The [Notice Description has been rectified *by removing company names and qualification information and specify 'response to this solicitation' ]

**Expected Contract Start Date:** February 12, 2024

**Expected Contract End Date:** January 10, 2025

**Contracting Entity Information:**
 The contracting entity for this solicitation is: 

*   Department of National Defense.
*   Contact: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help, Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca

Below is the relevant file for this tender:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30124/s4795356---method-1---rfp_0.pdf
